items.title: A Masterclass in Growth Strategy Design & Execution

visible_instructors.job_title: One of the world's leading Theory of Constraints Experts
visible_instructors.name: Dr Alan
visible_instructors.title: Dr Alan Barnard

items.headline: How to design, validate, plan, execute and audit a 10x business growth strategy within any organization
objectives_summary: You will learn how to use Theory of Constraints (TOC) to create a Strategy for achieving the very ambitious target of profitable, and sustainable growth target.
You will learn TOC's "Viable Vision Questions" to help you identify the fewest changes needed to achieve your ambitious profitable growth target
You will learn how to create a Financial Model to accurately predict the impact of operational changes on Net Profit and ROI.
